title.rendered: Smile children participate in Yoga by the bay

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation children participated in the Yoga by the bay event along with Shaina Nc and Mickey Mehta at Marine Drive, Mumbai on the 27th of November 2016. Shaina encouraged the kids to take up yoga at a young age to be healthy and fit.

The children learnt a lot from the session and were very happy to participate in the event.
